name: Pineapple Tail
description:
GameJam:  ATOM GameJam#2
Theme: You have to cheat to win

Except packs down below; I made everything in the game, including 3d lowpoly designs, scripting, game development, sound mixing.

We have a long lasting game: chess. But everyone has its own play now. Find how to cheat, and beat your opponent.

You can control the game by mouse entirely.
Walkthrough down below
